original_text: And Eli said, “What was it that he told you? Do not hide it from me. May God do so to you and more also if you hide anything from me of all that he told you.”
korean_text: 이르되 네게 무엇을 말씀하셨느냐 청하노니 내게 숨기지 말라 네게 말씀하신 모든 것을 하나라도 숨기면 하나님이 네게 벌을 내리시고 또 내리시기를 원하노라 하는지라

sentences.original_text: “What was it that he told you?
Do not hide it from me.
May God do so to you and more also
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 네게 그렇게 행하시고 더하게 하��리라.

sentences.original_text: if you hide anything from me
of all that he told you.”
